title: El Morro National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         Visitors enjoy the scenery along the Inscription Trail. NPS Photo  The visitor center, picnic area, and campground are all wheelchair accessible. The Inscription Trail is wheelchair accessible with assistance. The Headland Trail is not. A park ranger or volunteer will assist you with finding the best route when you arrive at El Morro.
